title: MaxDataSize (Property)
text:
PROPERTY MaxDataSize : WORD
Maximum data size for fixed size records, set to 0 to use records of variable size
The record size of a data file is fixed at creation, so changing MaxDataSize
during operation just affects client created log objects in case they have not been persistent.
